These config file seem to decrease the STOCK sunflare with distance.

Can someone tell me what does each number mean? I REAAAAAAAALY want to adjust the sunlight in RSS
You're not going to find answers to such a deep detail modding question in General Discussion. Try the add-on subforum, or better yet the Kopernicus mod thread itself

Each key represents a point along a curve. The first two values represent x and y values. The following two values are optional and represent the slope of the curve before and after that point.

Together, all keys represent a so called float curve.
